items.title: Ignore All User Interaction
items.description: By default all web containers ignore user interaction such as touch or scroll

items.title: $default Link Click Handling
items.description: Setting type: $default as the action will let the web container behave like a regular browser

items.title: Selective Link Click Handling via native jasonette action
items.description: You can set an action attribute to handle link clicks

items.title: Jasonette => Web Container $agent function call
items.description: The $jason.body.background web container is implemented as an agent. This means it supports all $agent APIs between Jasonette core and the container

items.title: $agent.inject into web container
items.description: You can inject 3rd party JavaScript files into existing web containers. This example demonstrates injection of pull to refresh behavior
